entry.name: QUnit.testDone
entry.title: QUnit.testDone()

argument.name: callback
argument.desc: Callback to execute. Provides a single argument with the following properties:

property.name: name
property.desc: Name of the next test to run

property.name: runtime
property.desc: The total runtime in millseconds of the test, including beforeEach and afterEach

entry.desc: Register a callback to fire whenever a test ends.

example.desc: Register a callback that logs results of a single test
